Celebrate Africa in 2015
Summer is around the corner ready to wrap its arms around us like a warm blanket. The smell is enough to make you fall in love. What could make this any better? Africa.
From the sunset-soaked beaches of Cape Town, to the placid waters of Chobe and the vast stretches of Namibia there’s a whole lot to be discovered with your significant other. Personally I can’t wait, it’s time to hang up my snuggly safari jacket and don my best sandals.
The time for sun, sand and Africa is coming… to celebrate, we’ve collected a few items of interest (find it all below). Don’t forget to browse our Travel Deals and grab a slice of summer fun for yourself.
See you in Africa.
~ Marcus Brain, Safari365 founder ~
